summary: Project to manage bench (“banc”) components and documents with proper site translation, enhanced document/component management, richer dashboard insights (assignments, versions, movement visualization), and full dashboard data export.
known_issues: Site translation is currently incorrect/regressed compared to previous versions

existing_features.title: Restore full-site translation behavior so that all user-visible UI strings render via the i18n translation system (useI18n.t) and correctly change when the language changes, matching the behavior of previous versions.

Ensure bench documents (HW/SW/Other(s)) can be managed with component-like operations: edit metadata, delete the document (not just unassign), download, and duplicate the document to reassign it to one or more other benches.
In the dashboard recap, display for each document: (1) the bench(es) it is assigned to and (2) its document version.
Add a dedicated, visual dashboard section that shows a flow of components that moved from Bench A to Bench B (a chart/flow visualization based on recorded move events).
In the Export tab/dialog, add an option to export all data shown/needed by the dashboard, including documents (with version and bench assignments) and the component movement flow data.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix/regain proper full-site translation behavior as in previous versions
Manage HW/SW/other documents as components: edit, delete, download, duplicate and reassign to another bench
Dashboard recap: show which benches each document is assigned to and the document version
Dashboard: dedicated visual flow/chart showing components that moved from Bench A to Bench B
Export tab: add option to export all dashboard data

projectName: Restore correct i18n, enhance document-as-component management, add dashboard assignment + movement visualization, and export full dashboard data
